name: jump-start-template
description: A shortcut to your favorite code

scripts.setup: npm run gallery:clone && npm run gallery:install && npm run gallery:link
scripts.dev: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run dev
scripts.build: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run build
scripts.storybook: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run storybook
scripts.build-storybook: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run build-storybook
scripts.update-readme: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run update-readme
scripts.update-screenshots: cd jump-start-gallery && JUMP_START_STARTERS=../ npm run update-screenshots
scripts.gallery:link: cd jump-start-gallery && rm -f src/starters && ln -sf ../../ src/starters && rm -rf .env && ln -sf ../.env .env

author: Kevin Schaul
